headline: Is News Corp (NWSA) Offering Value After Recent Share Price Slump?
summary: If you are wondering whether News is starting to look interesting at its current share price, this article will walk through what the recent moves might mean for value focused investors. The stock last closed at US$22.74, with a 7 day return of a 15.1% decline, a 30 day return of a 14.1% decline, a year to date return of a 13.2% decline and a 1 year return of a 21.5% decline, while the 3 year and 5 year returns sit at 23.7% and 0.3% respectively. These recent returns have come against a...
